mapper.select: SELECT /* GameMapper.getAllGames */ game_id, name, parent_id, color FROM game

SELECT /* GameMapper.getPermissibleGames */ g.game_id, g.color, IF(g.parent_id IS NULL, g.name, CONCAT(COALESCE(pg.name,''), ' > ', g.name)) AS name FROM game g LEFT JOIN game lg ON g.game_id = lg.parent_id LEFT JOIN game pg ON g.parent_id = pg.game_id GROUP BY g.game_id HAVING COUNT(lg.game_id) = 0 ORDER BY name
SELECT /* GameMapper.isSportsBet */ COUNT(kg.game_id) AS is_sports_bet FROM game g JOIN game kg ON g.game_id = kg.parent_id WHERE g.name = "Sports Betting" AND kg.game_id = #{id}
SELECT /* GameMapper.getGameById */ game_id, name, parent_id, color FROM game WHERE game_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* GameMapper.createGame */ game (name, parent_id, color) VALUES ( #{name}, #{parentId}, #{color} )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* GameMapper.updateGame */ game SET name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, color = #{color} WHERE game_id = #{gameId}
